value.title: StarCraft 2: The World Championship GRAND FINALS! (Best-of-7)
value.excerpt: Serral versus Reynor in a best-of-7 series of top level StarCraft 2. This series is the Grand Finals of IEM Katowice, and with that the finals of the World Championships.
